candidate Profile Description.summary: Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in Python, PyTorch, deep learning, computer vision, NLP, and AWS. Skilled in traditional machine learning algorithms, image processing, and data mining. Demonstrated proficiency in deploying solutions in computer vision and NLP.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.description: Completed projects in traditional machine learning. Developed and deployed solutions in computer vision using deep learning techniques. Led personal projects in NLP, trained a new tokenizer on Georgian language, and applied fine-tuning techniques. Gained expertise in AWS and deployed projects.

personal_projects.name: Image Similarity Search Engine
personal_projects.description: Designed an image similarity search engine to find similar images based on vector representations.

personal_projects.name: Pix2Pix Image-to-Image Translation
personal_projects.description: Focused on image-to-image translation task, converting images from one domain to another.

personal_projects.name: Document Layout Detection
personal_projects.description: Detected regions of the document layout using Yolov8 model.

personal_projects.name: Background Removal (Depth Estimation)
personal_projects.description: Removed background from images using U2NET model.

personal_projects.name: Semantic Segmentation
personal_projects.description: Performed semantic segmentation using Unet model.

personal_projects.name: Age-Gender-Emotion Classification
personal_projects.description: Classified age, gender, and emotion using ResNet models.
